CustomField.description: The API name, including namespace, of the checkbox field on the Assignment object that controls whether an assignment is excluded from forecasting calculations. If the checkbox field is selected on the record, the record is excluded.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name, including namespace, of the checkbox field on the Assignment object that controls whether an assignment is excluded from forecasting calculations. If the checkbox field is selected on the record, the record is excluded.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Forecast Assignment Field
